original_title: 教頭先生と私の秘密のラブラブ結婚生活 永野いち夏
overview: I'm Ichika, a school girl. Actually, I have a husband. That person is the vice principal of the same school. Of course it's a secret... I don't think it would be funny if I got caught! Please experience the daily life of Ichika's newlyweds!
title: The Secret Lovey-Dovey Married Life Of The Deputy Head Teacher And Me. Ichika Nagano.
